short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The ultimate companion for Roblox traders, with numerous tools to improve the efficiency and profitability of trading limited items.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RoValk is a free extension designed to improve the limited item trading experience on roblox.com.

RoValk's features include:
â€¢ Values on Trading Window  - see Rolimon's item values and calculated totals displayed within your trading pages!
â€¢ Values on Trade Lists - preview trade values on the trade list before opening any trades!
â€¢ Item Flags - items will be flagged with certain icons to notify you when an item is projected or rare!
â€¢ Trade Notifications - be notified by a desktop push notification when you receive inbound trades, or when your trades are accepted or declined!
â€¢ Trade Window Search - automatically search for specific items in a user's inventory while sending a trade!
â€¢ Rolimon's Profile Links - links will be added to items and user pages that link to the corresponding page on Rolimon's!
â€¢ ğ—”ğ—»ğ—± ğ—ºğ—®ğ—»ğ˜† ğ—ºğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—² ğ˜‚ğ˜€ğ—²ğ—³ğ˜‚ğ—¹ ğ—³ğ—²ğ—®ğ˜ğ˜‚ğ—¿ğ—²ğ˜€, with more being added with every update!
For a full list of features and their explanations, please visit our website:
https://rovalk.com/features

*Note that the Auto Trade Decliner no longer exists as a feature in the newest version, even though it still appears in the promotional video.*

What's New in Version 3.5 (1/8/2024):
â€¢ Values on Trade Lists now works for Outbound, Declined, and Completed trades as well as Inbound!
â€¢ Added new Show User RoliBadges feature!
â€¢ The Trade Notifier now works for Inbound, Outbound, and Completed trades, instead of just Inbounds!
â€¢ Updated much of the user interface to be more stylish!
â€¢ And more!
For more details on the update, see the update log on our website:
https://rovalk.com/updates
